
{{ModuleFunction|cURL}}
Set an curl option.

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
curlcode curlSetopt(curl handler, curloption option, bool/number/string value)
</syntaxhighlight>

==Required arguments==
* '''handler''' The curl handler.
* '''option''' An curl option, al the options are found [[/Modules/cURL/CURLOPT.md|here]]
* '''value''' The value, this can be a string, number or boolean. At the [[/Modules/cURL/CURLOPT.md|curl option list]] you can find wich option needs a string, number or boolean.

==Returns==
Returns a curlcode. Nevermind it for now, i even don't know what it is. But it returns it.

==Example==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
curl = curlInit("http://mtasa.com/");
if not curl then
    outputDebugString("Can't connect to http://mtasa.com/ with cURL");
else
    curlSetopt(curl, CURLOPT_POST, true);
    curlClose(curl);
end
</syntaxhighlight>
